plot: A young girl's life is turned upside down when she is abducted and forced into the world of human trafficking. The next 24 hours will transform her into a ruthless killer with only one thing on her mind, brutal revenge.
title: The Package: A Tale of Human Trafficking
plot_es: A young girl's life is turned upside down when she is abducted and forced into the world of human trafficking. The next 24 hours will transform her into a ruthless killer with only one thing on her mind, brutal revenge.
original_name: The Package: A Tale of Human Trafficking
